T03D3823:313a-0: @313a * // shes rab snying po'i rnam par bshad pa bzhugs /
T03D3823:313a-2: # // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3823:313a-3: bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa'i don thams cad bsdu na gnyis te /
T03D3823:313a-4: mngon par rtogs pa'i don dang /
T03D3823:313a-6: de la mdo rgyas 'bring gsum gyis ni gang zag gsum gyi dbang du byas nas /
T03D3823:313a-7: mngon par rtogs pa gtso bor ston pa yin la /
T03D3823:313a-8: bdun brgya pa la sogs pas ni snying po'i don gtso bor ston to //
T03D3823:313a-9: lam mngon par rtogs pa ye shes kyi dmigs pa gtso bor ston pa'o //
T03D3823:313a-10: de la rgyas 'bring gsum gyis gtso bor mngon rtogs bstan /
T03D3823:313a-11: yang snying po'i don shugs la bstan /
T03D3823:313a-12: bdun brgya pa la sogs pas gtsor snying po'i don bstan /
T03D3823:313a-13: mngon rtogs zhar la bstan to //
T03D3823:313a-14: 'dir yang snying po'i don bstan pa yin la 'di
T03D3823:313a-15: yang bi ma la mi tra ltar na don brgyad
T03D3823:313a-16: kyis mdo 'di'i don ma lus pa bstan pa yin
T03D3823:313a-17: no // don brgyad kyang gleng slong pa dang zhes
T03D3823:313a-18: bya ba la sogs pas lus rnam par gzhag pa
T03D3823:313a-19: no // yin no // de la slob dpon phyogs
T03D3823:313b-0: kyi glang po la @313b sogs pas mdo'i don gzhan
T03D3823:313b-1: du yang bshad pa yod de /
T03D3823:313b-5: gleng slong ba dang gleng gzhi'o //
T03D3823:313b-9: de yang sngon byung ba dang /
T03D3823:313b-13: thun mong dang khyad par gyi gleng gzhi'o //
T03D3823:313b-14: 'di gnyis kyi bye brag ni mdo thams cad la thun mong du yod pa dang /
T03D3823:313b-15: mdo 'di la yod pa gzhan la med pa'o //
T03D3823:313b-19: khyad par gyi gleng gzhi la gnyis te /
T03D3823:313b-20: gtso bo dang 'khor ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'o //
T03D3823:313b-22: dgos pa'i don ni sdud pa po rang nyid tshad ma'i skyes bur 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te /
T03D3823:313b-23: dus de tsam na ston pa 'di la 'khor 'di
T03D3823:313b-24: rnams dang gnas 'dir thos so zhes dbang po dang
T03D3823:313b-25: dan rtags dang bcas pa'i tshig brjod na /
T03D3823:313b-26: 'o na 'di bshad pa 'di bden no zhes sdud pa po la yid ches par 'gyur te /
T03D3823:313b-28: 'jig rten na yang dbang dang dan rtags zhib pas kho'i de bden no zhes rtogs pa bzhin no //
T03D3823:313b-29: de skad du yang slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos //
T03D3823:313b-30: dad ldan 'jug pa'i yan lag tu //
T03D3823:313b-31: rang nyid tshad mar rab bsgrub phyir //
T03D3823:313b-32: ston pa dang ni 'khor dbang po //
T03D3823:313b-33: yul dang dus sogs bstan pa yin //
T03D3823:313b-34: sdud par byed pas 'jig rten du //
T03D3823:313b-35: yul dang dus sogs bstan pa ni //
T03D3823:313b-36: dpang por bcas pa'i tshig brjod na //
T03D3823:313b-37: rang nyid tshad mar 'gro ba yin //
T03D3823:313b-39: 'di rnams kyi tshig don dang tshig rnam par sbyar ba ni gsal lo //
T03D3823:313b-40: des na mdo thams cad de ltar bshad par bya
T03D3823:313b-41: ba yin par brgyad stong pa'i bsdus don na bstan
T03D3823:313b-42: to // lhag ma ni mthun no //
T03D3823:313b-43: 'dir dri ma med pa'i bshes gnyen gyis de bkag ste /
T03D3823:313b-44: rang gi lugs gsal bar byed pa la dang po sun 'byin te /
T03D3823:313b-46: mi nus pa dang dbang por mi 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3823:313b-47: de la mi nus pa ni dgos pa de sgrub par mi nus pa ste /
T03D3823:313b-48: da lta ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams
T03D3823:313b-49: 'jug pa'i yan lag tu rang tshad ma'i skyes bur
T03D3823:313b-50: bsgrub pa'i phyir de smos so //
T03D3823:313b-51: dpang po'i dgos pa yang phyis de la the tshom za ba la sogs pa byung tsam na /
T03D3823:313b-52: de la thug pa yin la /
T03D3823:314a-1: mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams kyis mdo'i don gtan la 'bebs pa mi srid par 'gyur te /
T03D3823:314a-2: dpang po 'ga' zhig ni mya ngan las 'das la /
T03D3823:314a-3: kha cig gzhan na bzhugs pa ste /
T03D3823:314a-5: zab cing mtha' yas mdo sde yi //
T03D3823:314a-6: dkon mchog thos pa'i sred pa yis //
T03D3823:314a-7: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T03D3823:314a-8: don byed par ni 'gro phyir te //
T03D3823:314a-9: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03D3823:314a-10: kha cig ni 'di na bzhugs kyang mthong ba'i skal ba med do //
T03D3823:314a-11: 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T03D3823:314a-12: skyon gnyis pa de dgos pa de bsgrub par nus
T03D3823:314a-13: su chug kyang dpang po nyid du mi 'gyur te
T03D3823:314a-14: / dpang por 'gyur ba la 'di dang 'di dag
T03D3823:314a-15: ste zhes 'khor rnams kyi ming bstan pas dpang por
T03D3823:314a-17: rab 'byor dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dngos
T03D3823:314a-18: su ming bstan pas de ltar dpang du 'gyur ba
T03D3823:314a-19: la rag na / mdo 'di bzhin du 'khor gyi
T03D3823:314a-20: ming med pa dang dpang du ji ltar 'gyur zhes
T03D3823:314a-21: la rag na / zer ro // des na 'di ltar bshad de /
T03D3823:314a-22: sngon byung ba'i gleng gzhi dang bcas pa'i mdo bshad
T03D3823:314a-23: pa'i sngon rol du de'i gleng slong bar byed pa
T03D3823:314a-24: ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i gsungs pa yin
T03D3823:314a-25: no // 'dis ni dbri bskyungs med par yang dag par thos par bstan te /
T03D3823:314a-26: des 'khor rnams kyis phyin ci ma log par bstan
T03D3823:314a-27: par shes pas sdud pa po la legs par rna
T03D3823:314a-28: ba gtong pa la sogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
T03D3823:314a-29: // da ni gang la brten nas mdo 'di 'byung
T03D3823:314a-30: ba'i skabs su gyur pa'i gnas skabs de rtsom pa
T03D3823:314a-31: // ste / de la 'jug par byed pa ni
T03D3823:314a-32: dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la
T03D3823:314a-33: // ste / sogs pa'o // 'o na skabs de
T03D3823:314a-34: lta bu la brten nas byung ba'i mdo'i dbang du
T03D3823:314a-35: byas pa'i gang zag ji lta bu yin snyam nas
T03D3823:314a-36: bstan par gtogs pa 'dus pa ste /
T03D3823:314a-37: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3823:314a-38: chos nyan pa'i skal pa yod pa tshogs pa dang ldan par gtogs pa 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3823:314a-39: khyad par gyi gleng gzhi gang zhe na /
T03D3823:314a-40: de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtso bo
T03D3823:314a-41: dang 'khor ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa
T03D3823:314a-42: gnyis bstan to // 'o na gleng gzhi de gnyis
T03D3823:314a-43: rgyur byas pa las rtsom pa 'byung ba'i mdo gang
T03D3823:314a-44: gnyis bstan to // zhe na / dris pa dang
T03D3823:314a-45: lan gnyis kyis ston pa ni de nas zhes bya
T03D3823:314b-0: ba nas de ltar bslab par bya ba'i bar @314b
T03D3823:314b-1: gnyis bstan to // zhe na / gyis bstan to
T03D3823:314b-2: // 'o na de de bzhin gshegs pas ma gsungs
T03D3823:314b-3: par spyan ras gzigs kyis bshad pa 'di cang yin
T03D3823:314b-4: nam snyam pa'i 'khor gyi log rtog bzlog pa'i phyir
T03D3823:314b-5: sh'akya thub pa nyid kyis mthun 'gyur byin pa'o //
T03D3823:314b-6: 'o na 'di yang snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i dus su sangs rgyas pas /
T03D3823:314b-7: sangs rgyas gzhan pas 'od la sogs pa chung bas
T03D3823:314b-8: de kho na ltar yin nam ma yin nam snyam
T03D3823:314b-9: pa la / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes
T03D3823:314b-10: su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba de kho na
T03D3823:314b-11: ltar zad do snyam du dgongs pa'o //
T03D3823:314b-13: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang zhes bya
T03D3823:314b-14: bas ni rjes su yi rang ba dang sbyar ro
T03D3823:314b-15: // de ltar na mdo sde rin po che bshad
T03D3823:314b-16: pa la dga' ba skyes nas rjes su yi rang
T03D3823:314b-17: bar byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya
T03D3823:314b-19: de ni spyi'i don bsdus pa tsam mo //
T03D3823:314b-20: de la dris pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3823:314b-21: 'di'i don ni rten gyi gang zag gang la la 'dod pa ste /
T03D3823:314b-22: bye brag sgrub pa dang sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
T03D3823:314b-23: ji ltar bslab par bya ba ste /
T03D3823:314b-33: rtogs pa zhes bya ba rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
T03D3823:314b-34: de la gdams ngag ni 'di yin te /
T03D3823:314b-35: rigs dang ldan pa'i gang zag byang chub tu sems
T03D3823:314b-36: bskyed pas lam lnga la ji ltar bslab par bya
T03D3823:314b-38: lan ni lam rnam pa lnga la rnam par phye nas bstan pas bcu gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T03D3823:314b-40: dbang po rtul po'i dbang du byas pa dang /
T03D3823:314b-41: rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T03D3823:314b-42: de la dbang po rtul po ni lam lnga la slob pa'i tshe /
T03D3823:314b-43: lam re re'i dbang du byas nas kyang mtshan nyid
T03D3823:314b-44: thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa la ltos
T03D3823:314b-45: pa yin la / de'i dbang du byas nas lam
T03D3823:314b-46: lnga la slob pa'i tshul rnam par phye na bcur
T03D3823:314b-47: pa yin la / 'gyur ro // dbang po rnon
T03D3823:314b-48: po ni mgo smos pas go ba yin la de'i
T03D3823:314b-49: don du sngar don bcur ston pa de nyid bsdus
T03D3823:314b-50: nas sngags kyi don du bstan pa ste /
T03D3823:314b-51: de ltar na lan btab pa bcu gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T03D3823:314b-52: spyir na 'di gnyis ka yang dbang po rnon po
T03D3823:314b-53: yin mod kyi de la yang khyad par yod pas
T03D3823:315a-2: 'dir dbang po rtul po la bstan pa de yang
T03D3823:315a-3: dbang po rtul po gzhan la ltos nas gsang sngags
T03D3823:315a-5: ma gsangs kyang gsangs te bstan pa bzhin du song ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3823:315a-6: de yang gsang ba dang mi gsang ba ni blo la yod pa yin gyi /
T03D3823:315a-7: dngos po la ni bstan par bya ba la khyad par med la /
T03D3823:315a-8: ston pa la yang dpe mkhyud mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3823:315a-9: des na 'dir yang gsang sngags kyi don bshad pa
T03D3823:315a-10: de nyid snga ma la yang gsang ste bstan pa
T03D3823:315a-11: bzhin du 'jug pas gsang sngags kyi nges tshig dang
T03D3823:315a-12: ldan no // de la dang po mdo la rten
T03D3823:315a-13: rigs dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis byang chub mchog
T03D3823:315a-14: tu sems bskyed pa ni lam bskyed pa'i rten gyi
T03D3823:315a-15: gang zag yin pas de bshad pa ni /
T03D3823:315a-16: sh'a ri'i bu zhes bos nas rigs kyi bu 'am
T03D3823:315a-17: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhes bya bas
T03D3823:315a-18: rigs dang ldan pa'i gang zag bstan la /
T03D3823:315a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3823:315a-20: spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa zhes bya ba gnyis kyis dmigs par bya ba'i yul dang /
T03D3823:315a-21: 'dun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sems bskyed pa gnyis bshad de go rims bzhin no //
T03D3823:315a-22: 'dis ni dbang po rno rtul ma phye bar spyir bstan pa'o //
T03D3823:315a-23: dbang po rtul po'i dbang du byas pa'i lan bcu
T03D3823:315a-24: yang 'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las
T03D3823:315a-25: dmigs pa rnam pa bzhi bshad pa des don gyi
T03D3823:315a-27: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan lhag mthong gi dmigs pa dang /
T03D3823:315a-28: rnam par mi rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan zhi gnas kyi dmigs pa dang /
T03D3823:315a-29: dngos po mtha'i dmigs pa dang ;
T03D3823:315a-30: dgos pa yongs su grub pa'i dmigs pa'o //
T03D3823:315a-34: mi slob pa'i lam bzhi rim bzhin bstan par shes par bya'o //
T03D3823:315a-35: 'dir bsgom lam ni dmigs pa snga ma gsum nyid
T03D3823:315a-36: la dmigs pa ma gtogs pa dmigs pa lhag ma
T03D3823:315a-37: gzhan med pas logs su ma bstan te /
T03D3823:315a-38: de skad du yang mgon po byams pas /
T03D3823:315a-39: nges 'byed yan lag dang mthong ba'i /
T03D3823:315a-40: lam dang bsgom pa'i lam nyid la /
T03D3823:315a-41: yang dang yang du sems pa dang /
T03D3823:315a-42: 'jal dang nges rtog bsgom pa'i lam //
T03D3823:315a-44: de la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs
T03D3823:315b-0: brnyan lhag mthong @315b gi dmigs pa ni 'di ltar
T03D3823:315b-1: rnam par blta bar bya ste zhes bya bas bstan
T03D3823:315b-2: to // 'dis ni tshogs kyi lam gyi gnas skabs
T03D3823:315b-3: na yod pa'i de kho na nyid la so sor
T03D3823:315b-4: rtog pa'i shes rab bstan to //
T03D3823:315b-5: mthong lam du ni dmigs pa thams cad mnyam pa
T03D3823:315b-6: nyid du rtogs pas dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs
T03D3823:315b-8: 'dir ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnam pa
T03D3823:315b-9: sna tshogs su dngos po la yod par zhen cing
T03D3823:315b-11: rnam par rtog pa ni mi 'dra ba 'am sna tshogs su rtog par byed pa'o //
T03D3823:315b-12: de ltar rtog pa'i shes rab de nyid ting nge
T03D3823:315b-13: 'dzin med pas na lhag mthong tsam gyi rang bzhin
T03D3823:315b-14: yin la / mthong lam du skye ba'i mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan tsam yin pas na /
T03D3823:315b-15: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan lhag mthong gi dmigs pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3823:315b-16: des na rnam par blta bar bya ste zhes 'byung
T03D3823:315b-17: ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs su so sor brtag
T03D3823:315b-19: dris pa'i skabs nas kyang bshad do //
T03D3823:315b-20: de ltar tshogs lam skyes pa la shes pa gzhan
T03D3823:315b-21: gyis bar mchod par drod la sogs pa nges 'byed
T03D3823:315b-22: skye ba yin pas mdo'i tshig 'dis ni rnam par
T03D3823:315b-23: mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhi gnas kyi dmigs pa
T03D3823:315b-24: yang 'di nyid kyis bshad pa yin no //
T03D3823:315b-25: de la rnam par mi rtog pa ni gong du
T03D3823:315b-26: bstan pa'i thos bsam gyi shes pa kha phyir bltas
T03D3823:315b-27: nas dmigs pa sna tshogs la rtog pa de ltar
T03D3823:315b-28: mi rtog cing gcig tu nang nyid du rtog pa
T03D3823:315b-29: bsdus pa ste / de nyid kyang chos thams cad
T03D3823:315b-30: mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i lhag mthong mthong lam
T03D3823:315b-31: du skye ba de lta bu med kyang zhi gnas
T03D3823:315b-33: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhi gnas kyi dmigs pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
T03D3823:315b-34: de ltar dmigs pa gnyis bshad nas /
T03D3823:315b-35: da ni gsum pa dngos po'i mtha'i dmigs pa ston te //
T03D3823:315b-36: de la dngos po ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T03D3823:315b-37: de'i mtha' ni rang bzhin nam chos nyid de /
T03D3823:315b-38: de la dmigs pa ni dngos po'i mtha' la dmigs pa'o //
T03D3823:315b-42: dmigs pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang /
T03D3823:315b-43: rnam pa des rnam par bltas pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T03D3823:315b-44: de la phung po lnga po de dag la yang
T03D3823:315b-45: ngo bo nyid kyis stong par yang yang dag par
T03D3823:316a-0: rjes su blta'o zhes bya ba ni gong du @316a
T03D3823:316a-1: * // bstan pa ltar dngos po dang /
T03D3823:316a-3: de la dmigs pa gsum bstan pas mthong lam gyi dmigs pa bstan pa'o //
T03D3823:316a-4: tshig don ni 'grel pa nas gsal lo //
T03D3823:316a-5: dmigs pa de la rnam pa gang gis zhugs na
T03D3823:316a-6: yang dag par rjes su lta ba phyin ci ma
T03D3823:316a-7: ltog par lta bar 'gyur ba yin zhe na /
T03D3823:316a-8: gzugs stong pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3823:316a-10: rnam pa so so'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03D3823:316a-13: de la dang po ni gsal lo //
T03D3823:316a-14: grangs nges pa ni 'dir snying po'i don bshad pa yin la /
T03D3823:316a-15: snying po'i don gyi gtso bo yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yin no //
T03D3823:316a-16: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang zab mo'i don brgyad kyis bsdus te /
T03D3823:316a-17: dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T03D3823:316a-18: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid yin la /
T03D3823:316a-19: stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa gnyis kyis kyang rang gi ngo bos stong pa dang /
T03D3823:316a-20: spyi'i ngo bos stong pa gnyis bshad pas lta ba'i
T03D3823:316a-21: dbang du byas nas de gnyis su stong pa nyid
T03D3823:316a-22: kyi don thams cad 'dus pa yin pas de bshad
T03D3823:316a-23: do // mtshan nyid med pa ni rgyu mtshan dang bral ba ste /
T03D3823:316a-24: rgyu yang 'bras bu la ltos nas rgyur 'jog pa yin la /
T03D3823:316a-25: de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu 'bras dang /
T03D3823:316a-26: rnam par byang ba'i rgyu 'bras gnyis su 'dus pa
T03D3823:316a-27: yin pas ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa dri ma
T03D3823:316a-28: med pa dri ma dang bral ba med pa ste
T03D3823:316a-30: smon pa med pa ni 'bras bu la smon pa'i yul gnyis te /
T03D3823:316a-31: skyon dang bral ba dang yon tan dang ldan par smon pa'o //
T03D3823:316a-32: de gnyis dang bral ba ni smon pa med pa'o //
T03D3823:316a-33: des na rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi rang bzhin la /
T03D3823:316a-34: dgag bya brgyad bkag pa'i rnam pa yang brgyad kho nar nges so //
T03D3823:316a-36: go rims nges pa ni mdo sde thams cad du
T03D3823:316a-37: bde bar gshegs pas stong pa nyid kyi rnam par
T03D3823:316a-38: thar pa sngon la bstan la /
T03D3823:316a-39: de nas mtshan ma med pa tha mar smon pa med pa'o //
T03D3823:316a-40: 'dir de nyid kyis nges pa yin no //
T03D3823:316a-41: sangs rgyas kyi lta ba dang /
T03D3823:316a-42: spyod pa dang 'bras bu gsum rim gyis skye la /
T03D3823:316a-43: de gsum la zhen pa'i gnyen po gsum rim bzhin
T03D3823:316a-44: du bstan la grangs nges pa de nyid kyis go
T03D3823:316a-46: des na mdo 'di'i bshad bya gtso bo yang zab
T03D3823:316b-0: pa'i don brgyad po 'di nyid yin no zhes @316b
T03D3823:316b-1: dri ma med pa'i bshes gnyen gyis bshad do //
T03D3823:316b-2: da ni dmigs pa de la rnam pa 'di brgyad
T03D3823:316b-3: kyi sgo nas rnam par bltas pa'i 'bras bu shes
T03D3823:316b-4: pa'i snang ba ji lta bu skye ba de bstan
T03D3823:316b-5: pa'i phyir / sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na
T03D3823:316b-6: de'i tshe stong pa nyid la zhes bya ba la
T03D3823:316b-7: pa'i phyir / sogs pa ste / de lta bas
T03D3823:316b-8: na zhes bya ba ni ji skad gsungs pa'i rnam
T03D3823:316b-9: pa rnams kyis dmigs pa de la rnam par bltas
T03D3823:316b-10: pa'i phyir / sogs pa ste / pa na'o // de'i tshe ni de'i dus na ste /
T03D3823:316b-11: rnam par bltas pa'i dus na'o //
T03D3823:316b-13: stong pa nyid la gzugs med ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3823:316b-14: stong pa nyid mthong ba la gzugs la sogs pa
T03D3823:316b-15: yang dag par mi dmigs pa'i shes pa skye ba'o
T03D3823:316b-16: // des na dmigs pa de la rnam pa 'di
T03D3823:316b-17: brgyad kyi sgo nas goms par byas pa la stong
T03D3823:316b-18: pa nyid du snang ba'i shes pa 'di 'dra ba
T03D3823:316b-19: skyes pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin
T03D3823:316b-21: de ltar mthong lam skyes pa la /
T03D3823:316b-22: bsgom lam skye bas de ston pa ni /
T03D3823:316b-23: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3823:316b-25: de'i rjes thogs su bar chad med pa'i lam rdo
T03D3823:316b-26: rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skye ba yin pa
T03D3823:316b-27: las de ma bstan par sangs rgyas kyi sa'i spong
T03D3823:316b-28: ba che ba ston pa ni bsgom lam gyi sgrib
T03D3823:316b-29: pa gnyis spangs pa la spong ba che bar 'dod
T03D3823:316b-30: pa na / de ni bsgom lam dang 'brel par
T03D3823:316b-31: shes par bya ba'i don du bsgom lam gyi rjes
T03D3823:316b-32: pa na / la bstan to // de yang 'dir spong pa ni lan cig yin no //
T03D3823:316b-33: de ni sems la sgrib pa med de zhes bya ba nas mthar phyin to'i bar go sla'o //
T03D3823:316b-34: bar chad med pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir dus gsum
T03D3823:316b-35: du rnam par zhes bya ba nas brten nas zhes
T03D3823:316b-37: / sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba la 'dir
T03D3823:316b-38: sangs rgyas ni yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3823:316b-39: sangs rgyas ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ba nas
T03D3823:316b-40: / sa bcu'i khyad par gyi lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
T03D3823:316b-41: de'i lam na rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yin par 'grel pa nas gsal bar bshad ngo //
T03D3823:316b-42: 'dir ni mdo las rtogs pa che ba dang sems
T03D3823:316b-43: dpa' che ba gnyis gtsor bstan pa'i zhar la bar
T03D3823:316b-44: mchod pa'i rgyu 'di yang zhar byung du bstan pa
T03D3823:316b-45: yin no // de ltar spangs pa'i bdag nyid bstan nas /
T03D3823:317a-0: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid rnam pa gnyis bstan pa'i phyir bla na med @317a * //
T03D3823:317a-1: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03D3823:317a-3: ji snyed yod pa mkhyen pa dang ji ltar mkhyen pa ste /
T03D3823:317a-4: sems dpa' che ba dang rtogs pa che ba gnyis yin pas lan gnyis su gzhag pa yin no //
T03D3823:317a-5: de la bla na med pa zhes bya bas ni dmigs par bya ba'i yul dang /
T03D3823:317a-6: de rjes su sgrub pa'i rgyu dang /
T03D3823:317a-7: 'bras bu thob pa bla na med pa ste /
T03D3823:317a-8: de gsum gyis ni ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstan pa yin te /
T03D3823:317a-9: de gsum dang ldan pas shes bya'i dngos po thams
T03D3823:317a-10: cad skyu ru ra lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar
T03D3823:317a-11: mkhyen pa'o // yang dag par mnyam pa'i byang chub
T03D3823:317a-12: tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya
T03D3823:317a-13: bas ni ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T03D3823:317a-14: mkhyen pa'o // bstan pa ste / 'grel pa nas gsal bar bstan to //
T03D3823:317a-15: de ltar na dbang po rtul po'i dbang du byas nas /
T03D3823:317a-16: tshogs lam sbyor lam gnyis la lan re re dang /
T03D3823:317a-18: bsgom lam la gcig / bar chad med pa'i lam
T03D3823:317a-19: la gcig / sangs rgyas kyi sa la gsum ste
T03D3823:317a-20: / de ltar lan btab pa bcus lam lnga la slob pa'i tshul legs par bshad pa yin no //
T03D3823:317a-21: da ni dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas nas
T03D3823:317a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don mdor
T03D3823:317a-23: bsdus nas gsang sngags kyi don du bshad pa ni
T03D3823:317a-24: / sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3823:317a-25: lam lnga po de dag shes pa'i don dang skyob pa'i don dang /
T03D3823:317a-26: de gnyis kyi phan yon dang /
T03D3823:317a-27: sngags nyid kyi bshad pa dang /
T03D3823:317a-28: de ni lan bcu gcig pa yin no //
T03D3823:317a-29: de ni dri ba'i skabs ji ltar bslab par bya
T03D3823:317a-30: zhes dris pa'i lan yongs su rdzogs so zhes bstan
T03D3823:317a-31: pa'i phyir de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bstan pa
T03D3823:317a-32: yin no ; / dge slong legs pa'i shes rab kyis //
T03D3823:317a-33: mar me mdzad dpal ye shes la //
T03D3823:317a-34: gsol btab legs par bshad pa yin //
T03D3823:317a-35: de don bdag gis gzhung du bris //
T03D3823:317a-36: deng sang bod kyi rgyal khams 'dir //
T03D3823:317a-37: sngar gyi lugs ngan la zhen pas //
T03D3823:317a-38: da dung dam pa'i gdams ngag la //
T03D3823:317a-39: legs bshad yin par mi shes kyang //
T03D3823:317a-40: 'on kyang shes rab ldan pa la //
T03D3823:317a-41: phan snyam snying rje'i bsam pas bris //
T03D3823:317a-42: rgyal yum legs par rtogs byed cing //
T03D3823:317a-43: sdang bas smra bar ma gyur cig //
T03D3823:317a-44: rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
